caption: The video tells the story of a bachelor party for two individuals and a case that causes embarrassment for one of them. While one tries to solve a murder case, the other saves a life. The case involves the most perfect locked-room murder one of them has ever encountered. At the bachelor party, they drink, chat, and experience some awkward moments. Highlights include one of them saving a life, solving the most perfect locked-room murder case, the bachelor party, drinking and chatting at the party, awkward moments between them, international reputation, some details of the case, their friendship, one's alcohol tolerance, and the wedding preparations for them.
